column5: Brought to you by the Hamilton and K/W Chapters of Muskies Canada!  April 25th ain't far off, what's better than fighting the crowds at the local tribs? Come see Aaron Shirley, Bob Mehsikomer,Larry Ramsell, and MNR Biologists Jason Borwick and Arunus Liskaukus give thier presentations.  JBs Fishing Depot will have all their Muskie gear there, many local custom bait makers and more!  All proceeds raised by Muskies Canada go back into the fishery via MNR projects!!!  This is your chance to help! Come out and help support Muskie Conservation!  http://www.muskiescanada.ca/whats_new/odyssey.php
Thanks for the info, I'm hoping to get there
i'll be there, i have to figure out how many tickets i need and i will fire you off an email at home.
I've got my ticket. Can't wait for the 25th.
Since this was posted months ago I've been thinking about it. It's only 15 mins down the road from my place.... But did you have to schedule it for the trout opener? You're killin' me here.

For anyone with an interest in musky fishing, this is an excellent show and a great way to spend a day. Alot of tackle and fishin gear from around Ontario is available and there's always some excellent speakers putting on seminars every year.  Myself, I'm looking forward to hearing Bob Mehsikomer, he's got an excellent TV show and his seminar should be good too.  A bunch of us usually meet up for breakfast at 7:00 just down the road from the hotel then head over and spend the entire day.  Always guaranteed to be a great show !!
Planning to attend as well.  I'll be travelling out of Barrie ,Anyone need a ride from the greater Barrie let me know ,Lots of room in the Mini van ! and its an Odyssey too! TB
Now Mike, all the Steelies you land in a season and you want to be out on Opener fighting the crowds???
I should be there, along with Bill, and probably a couple others. Always a good time! See you there!

For you guys that dont know this show is every other year I made the mistake 4 years ago and did not go I was not thinking that I would ahve t owait 2 years to go so if you are at all interested come out it will be a great time. We have our room booked from Friday to Sunday it will be a great time for sure.  Lew I also want to see Bob and check out what he has to say his show is in my top 3 for musky shows
motion to make the next one in two years sometime in february?  late april = ice out trout & one of my fave times to be on the water  have fun everyone
i went in '05  great show indeed, and I am not even a huge hardcore musky guy  i too wish it was scheduled earlier in winter... that is a prime weekend to be out for reel-peeling spring salmon
Not a bad idea! Raf, I always wonder why you don't belong to Muskies Canada? You could help organize the 2011 Odyssey, as of right now we lack for people stepping up!
